name: Ruth Wishengrad

jv_history.partner_name: Ruth Husko's Personal Beatles - Your Own Personal Beatles | Podcast on Spotify
jv_history.source_quote: 's guests is the very, very funny writer and internet comedy sensation, Ruth Husko,

what_you_do: Ruth Wishengrad is an educator and creator of 'Self-Talk Songs', which incorporate neuroscience techniques into songs to boost self-confidence in children.
social_proof: Ruth Wishengrad, M.Ed., was an invited speaker on the World-Wide Collaboration in Art Therapy panel at the Creative Arts Therapy conference in Beijing, China in August 2015 and an invited presenter at the International Conference on Art Therapy in Hong Kong in May 2016.
business_focus: Developing programs to boost self-confidence in children through music and movement.
